headline.seo: Diet Soft Drinks Linked to Risk of Heart Disease
headline.print_headline: Risks: Diet Soft Drinks Linked to Heart Disease
headline.main: Risks: Diet Soft Drinks Linked to Heart Disease

docs.abstract: Hannah Gardener study in The Journal of General Internal Medicine finds that daily consumption of diet soda is associated with an increased risk for cardiovascular disease.
docs.lead_paragraph: A study of 2,564 adults found a link, even when controlling for other variables. But researchers caution against alarm, saying the reason for the link is not clear.
docs.snippet: A study of 2,564 adults found a link, even when controlling for other variables. But researchers caution against alarm, saying the reason for the link is not clear.

docs.abstract: The government regulates tobacco and alcohol. Why not diet?
docs.snippet: The government regulates tobacco and alcohol. Why not diet?

headline.seo: Qnexa Weight-Loss Drug Wins Advisory Panel’s Support
headline.print_headline: In Reversal, F.D.A. Panel Endorses A Diet Pill
headline.main: Advisory Panel Favors Approval for Weight-Loss Drug

docs.abstract: Federal committee recommends that the Food and Drug Administration approve Qnexa, what could become the first new prescription drug to treat obesity in 13 years; strongly positive vote, which was not widely expected, represents a stunning comeback for the drug and for its developer Vivus.
docs.lead_paragraph: A committee recommended that the Food and Drug Administration approve what could become the first new prescription drug to treat obesity in 13 years.
docs.snippet: A committee recommended that the Food and Drug Administration approve what could become the first new prescription drug to treat obesity in 13 years.

headline.main: Innovation for the People, by the People

docs.abstract: The White House strategy of offering prizes to the public for their solutions to critical problems is working.
docs.snippet: The White House strategy of offering prizes to the public for their solutions to critical problems is working.
